name: 路易吉·伽伐尼
bio_short: 意大利医生、物理学家和生物学家。他发现了“动物电”（生物电），即神经通过电信号向肌肉传递命令，这开创了“神经科学”和“生物电磁学”领域。
bio_short_en: An Italian physician, physicist, and biologist. He discovered 'animal electricity' (bioelectricity), demonstrating that nerves pass electrical signals to muscles. This founded the fields of neuroscience and bioelectromagnetics.
